group_1.narration: Looking back, perhaps fate led us here@from the moment we heard that fairy tale...

group_1.textLeft: Alright, it's finally time to announce the@winners of this year's Coordinator Awards!

group_1.textRight: That's the first I've heard of this event...

group_1.textLeft: The winner of the "Kindness" category,@the most difficult one of them all...
...is none other than Momoko Togame!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, yeah, thanks very much...

group_1.textLeft: Momoko! Why aren't you thrilled?

group_1.textRight: You're puttin' me up to something,@aren't ya?
Like, there's some stunt you want me to@pull as part of the prize and all...

group_1.textLeft: Why, you know exactly what@I was about to say, Momoko.
I've had a prize prepared in advance for@the winner of the "Kindness" category.

group_1.textRight: I knew it...

group_1.textLeft: And the prize iiiiis...
Get excited!
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]...the right to go on a treasure hunt@with your one and only Coordinator!

group_1.textRight: Ha...that's about what I expected from you.@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Is this treasure hunt one of your projects?

group_1.textLeft: No, it's not like that.
Instead...it was an amazing@discovery of Mii's!

group_1.textRight: You mean Mikage?

group_1.textLeft: That's the one.
She heard a story the other day@at the candy store...

group_1.narration: "Once upon a time,@there was a girl with@mysterious powers."
"The girl fell in love with a sailor@who stopped by her village,@and they eloped together by boat."
"But the boat was destroyed as they escaped,@and the lovers and the village treasure they stole@sank to the depths of the lightless sea..."

group_1.textLeft: And then...
"Hey, I bet this fairy tale is secretly talking@about the location of a real treasure!"
...At least, that's what Mii said.

group_1.textRight: That Mikage... She's really takin'@after her big sister, ain't she?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, she has my sense of curiosity.

group_1.textRight: Ain't what I meant...
Anyway, even if the fairy tale's got some basis@in reality, where are we supposed to look?

group_1.textLeft: I already have an idea.

group_1.textRight: That was quick.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Don't underestimate a Coordinator's@information network.

group_1.textRight: Well, if you've got it tracked down,
why don't you go there with Mikage?

group_1.textLeft: I wish I could...
But since the location is outside of@Kamihama, I can't take her with me.

group_1.textRight: Gotcha...

group_1.textLeft: And considering all the commotion@over the [textYellow:Kimochi] Stones,
I can't exactly invite any of the others@to join me, can I?

group_1.textRight: But somehow, it's okay to ask me?

group_1.textLeft: Of course it's alright.@You're Momoko, after all.

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* So all that stuff about me bein' the@best in kindness was buttering me up?

group_1.textLeft: I take it that's a "no," then...?

group_1.textRight: ...Alright. I'll come with you.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* I knew you would.
You're my guardian, after all.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I am.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, make sure you keep your weekend@free and clear, got it?
I've already arranged accommodations@for you and I.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Huh?!
You weren't gonna let me@refuse in the first place!
